channel.title: Need help setting up new SERVER! :)
channel.description:
[b]Right, i have just set up my wireless network on my new vista computer upstairs and want to know how to set up a new server.
[font=Verdana][font=Verdana][font=Verdana][u]Can anyone help me?[/u][/font][/font][/font] Can someone guide me through the steps pleasee :) I would really appreciate it :D
Thanks :)[/b][br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 29, 2009, 02:16:37 pm[/size][hr]Bump :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 29, 2009, 02:27:00 pm[/size][hr]please help :/

item.title: Need help setting up new SERVER! :)
item.dc:creator: @J_K0_U J K0 U
item.description:
@J_K0_U wrote:

Iv got No-ip, and have setup a host. And run the source while no-ip is running and try and load up my ip changer client (508) and it say that error_5js or sutin lyk that :S.

Can anyone help ??[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 29, 2009, 03:33:11 pm[/size][hr]right iv just tryed it on a 317 and it worked useing a client i downloaded. But when i try it on a 508 with my 508 source and client, the client doesnt load and says error_5js… <that crap.

Can anyone help me ?? pleasee
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 29, 2009, 04:09:53 pm[/size][hr]pleasee

Read full topic

item.title: Need help setting up new SERVER! :)
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

Here is everything you need to start a server:

[b]1. Tutorial: How to Start a Server.
2. A Brain.

For learning the slight amount of Java knowledge required to develop a server, refer to our good friend Google, as well as The Java™ Tutorials.[/b]

[CENTER]

The Java tutorials[/CENTER]

Hope I helped.
